backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of various frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to build and deploy the two standalone frontend versions.
frontend/index.css: CSS file defining Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH-themed color variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app entry script.
frontend/scripts/build-v1.sh: Script that builds the v1 variant and moves output to dist-v1/.
frontend/scripts/build-v2.sh: Script that builds the v2 variant and moves output to dist-v2/.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling simple route state and rendering Question or Success screens based on build-time variant config.
frontend/src/config/appVariant.ts: Chooses v1 or v2 build variant based on environment and exposes versionâ€‘specific heading text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and updating a backend actor tied to Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveFixedPositi: Hook computing random fixed button positions and repositions the evasive button on interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup plus custom romantic theme variables, component styles, and animations for hearts and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/screens/QuestionScreen.tsx: Screen showing a heading and a Yes button, with a fixed-position evasive No button using a custom hook.
frontend/src/screens/SuccessScreen.tsx: Success screen rendering floating heart animations and celebratory text.
frontend/src/screens/VersionSelectScreen: Empty placeholder file for a version selection screen.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, fonts, and container settings with romantic color variables.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements and issues, especially the need for two separate standalone builds.
